channel.title: Data Management on Principia Materia
channel.description: Recent content in Data Management on Principia Materia

item.title: Data Wrapper
item.description: Like many python-based application, PM will need to take input data from the command line and YAML input files. A mechanism is needed to enforce the data type of the input data, and possibly do some preprocessing of the data. Additionally, data will needed to be output in various formats, and some postprocessing of the data may be needed when creating output. The DataWrapper class is one means that PM uses to handle these tasks.
